description: This file contains CSS styles for theme management and overall layout of the application. It includes light and dark theme variables, styles for components including the App, App-header, App-link, and a theme toggle button, as well as responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container that centers its content and applies primary background and text colors based on the theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style rules for the application logo, including its height and animation settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, providing layout, background color, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style rules for links within the application, including color changes on hover.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button to toggle between themes, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
